Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Neilian Drive, south of the great Dragon's Citadel.
Room.LongDescription: The two things in Oceancrest which really hold some mystery to the citizens and visitors of the city are the Allakaren Pyramid and the Dragon's Citadel. The City was essentially formed around these two landmarks which have probably existed longer than anyone can remember.
